SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT537
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account servicer (account servicing institution) to an account owner or its designated agent. The account servicer may be a local agent (sub custodian) acting on behalf of their global custodian customer, or a custodian acting on behalf of an investment management institution or a broker/dealer.
This message is used to provide, as at a specified time, the details of pending increases and decreases of holdings, for all or selected securities in a specified safekeeping account, for all or selected reasons why the transaction is pending.
The statement may also include future settlement or forward transactions which have become binding on the account owner.
This message may also be used to respond to a request for statement/status advice, ie, the MT 549 Request for Statement/Status Advice and to report that there are no pending transactions.

Validation.Comment: Continuation Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T97):

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: Last page of a statement with more than one page.

Code.Name: MORE
Code.Description: Intermediate page of a statement which contains additional pages.

Code.Name: ONLY
Code.Description: Only page of the statement.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86):

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85):

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
If Qualifier is STST, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: STAT
Code.Description: Statement is sorted by status (sequence B is to be used).

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Statement is sorted by transaction (sequence C is to be used).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ADHO
Code.Description: Statement is sent following a request by the Receiver.

Code.Name: DAIL
Code.Description: Statement is sent daily (once per day, end-of-day).

Code.Name: INDA
Code.Description: Statement is sent intra-day (multiple reports during the day).

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Statement is sent monthly (once per month).

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Statement is sent weekly (once per week).

Code.Name: YEAR
Code.Description: Statement is sent yearly (once per year).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CODE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Statement gives complete information (including information (positions, instruction statuses) which is unchanged).

Code.Name: DELT
Code.Description: Statement contains changes which have not yet been reported (delta report, that is, changes only).

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'.(Error code(s): T26).
Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: A cancellation request from yourself for this instruction is pending, waiting for further processing.

Code.Name: CGEN
Code.Description: The transaction was created by the account servicer or a third party. It was not instructed directly by the account owner

Code.Name: CPRC
Code.Description: A cancellation request from your counterparty for this transaction is pending, waiting for your cancellation request

Code.Name: MPRC
Code.Description: A modification request from your counterparty for this transaction is pending waiting for your modification request or your consent.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged by the account servicer

Code.Name: PPRC
Code.Description: Processing of the instruction is pending

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted but in repair

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MTCH or INMH and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: MACH
Code.Description: Instruction has been matched.

Code.Name: NMAT
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Instruction is pending. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is still possible

Code.Name: PENF
Code.Description: Instruction is failing. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is no longer possible

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis

Code.Name: AWMO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are delivered, but still awaiting money from the counterparty

Code.Name: AWSH
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not yet been received from the counterparty

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Processing batch differs in the counterparty's instruction, eg, daytime/real-time versus overnight

Code.Name: BENO
Code.Description: Disagreement in beneficial ownership

Code.Name: BLOC
Code.Description: Your account is blocked, no instruction can settle over the account

Code.Name: BOTH
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction and your instruction are on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting financial instruments from a corporate action issue or other procedure, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting

Code.Name: CDLR
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode infrastructure platform is awaiting release.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Certificate number error

Code.Name: CHAS
Code.Description: A chaser/enquiry has been sent

Code.Name: CLAC
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in counterparty's account or counterparty does not hold financial instruments

Code.Name: CLHT
Code.Description: Instructed settlement date does not agree with the settlement date on the Clearing House trade, ie, a specific type of trade in India

Code.Name: CMON
Code.Description: Insufficient money in counterparty's account

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Financial instruments are not deliverable as they are pledged as collateral

Code.Name: CPEC
Code.Description: Counterparty is in receivership (form of bankruptcy where a court appointed person, the receiver, manages the affairs of the business).

Code.Name: CSDH
Code.Description: Central securities depository has set the instruction in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode.

Code.Name: CVAL
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode as it fulfils predefined conditions of a restriction processing type in the market infrastructure platform.

Code.Name: CYCL
Code.Description: Instruction is confirmed in the local market or is ready for settlement, awaiting next settlement cycle

Code.Name: DENO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed does not match the denomination available/deliverable. Physical securities need to be obtained in deliverable denominated quantities

Code.Name: DEPO
Code.DetailedName: Refused Deposit for Issue of Depositary Receipts
Code.Description: Deposit of shares for the issuing of depositary receipts has been refused. The allotment for depositary receipts granted by the issuer is exceeded by your transaction

Code.Name: DISA
Code.Description: Exceptional closing of all financial institutions due to natural disaster, eg, earthquake

Code.Name: DKNY
Code.Description: Counterparty has returned or refuses the securities

Code.Name: DOCC
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from counterparty.

Code.Name: DOCY
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from you.

Code.Name: FLIM
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account as maximum foreign limit has been reached

Code.Name: FROZ
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked at the CSD following a corporate event

Code.Name: FUTU
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement date. No settlement problems to be reported

Code.Name: GLOB
Code.Description: Settlement cannot be executed; financial instruments are in global form

Code.Name: IAAD
Code.Description: Pending reason being investigated

Code.Name: INBC
Code.Description: Not all the instructions part of a pool have been received.

Code.Name: INCA
Code.Description: Financial instruments require income adjustment, eg, dividend or interest

Code.Name: LAAW
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement of a purchase to cover failing positions.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient financial instruments in your account

Code.Name: LALO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are out on loan

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline

Code.Name: LINK
Code.Description: Your instruction is pending settlement because the instruction linked to it is pending

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: Central Bank Liquidity is insufficient

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient money in your account and/or credit line is insufficient

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NCON
Code.Description: Confirmation of settlement has not yet been received

Code.Name: NEWI
Code.Description: Financial instrument is a new issue and not yet available/tradable

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched; matching process is not required

Code.Name: NOFX
Code.Description: A foreign exchange instruction from you is missing

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Trade will settle in partials.

Code.Name: PHCK
Code.Description: Physical financial instruments have been received and are being checked for authenticity

Code.Name: PHSE
Code.Description: Settlement is physical. Financial instruments are being delivered

Code.Name: PRCY
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Your instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: PRSY
Code.Description: The transaction was put on hold by the system.

Code.Name: REFS
Code.Description: Delivery/receipt was refused because physical financial instruments are not in good order

Code.Name: REFU
Code.Description: Instruction has been refused or not recognised and is represented automatically

Code.Name: REGT
Code.Description: Certificates have been lodged with the registrar but rejected due to incomplete documentation or foreign ownership limitation reached

Code.Name: SBLO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked due to a corporate action event, realignment, etc

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Stamp duty information is missing

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method has been modified at CSD to allow settlement

Code.Name: TAMM
Code.Description: Trade is being amended in the market.

Code.Name: YCOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral in your account to execute the instruction

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CGEN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to a market claim following a corporate action.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated for collateral management purposes

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to return a delivery previously instructed

Code.Name: SPLI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to enable settlement following a shortage of position

Code.Name: THRD
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated by a third party, eg, a central counterparty

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to transformation following a corporate action.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as per your request

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the settlement system

Code.Name: CSUB
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the agent

Code.Name: CTHP
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by a third party.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is NMAT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ACRU
Code.Description: Accrued interest amount does not match.

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer’s deadline.Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Transaction call delay does not match.

Code.Name: CLAT
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction was too late for matching

Code.Name: CMIS
Code.Description: A matching instruction from your counterparty could not be found

Code.Name: CPCA
Code.Description: Counterparty cancelled their instruction

Code.Name: DCMX
Code.Description: Disagreement if trade was executed cum or ex.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Settlement date/time does not match

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Deal price does not match

Code.Name: DELN
Code.Description: Direction of the trade does not match. Counterparty expects a delivery from you, not a receipt or vice versa

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Place of settlement does not match

Code.Name: DMCT
Code.Description: Disagreement on automatic generation of market claim or transformation.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Settlement amount does not match

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument does not match

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Financial instrument identification does not match, eg, ISIN differs, Financial Instrument Attributes differs

Code.Name: DTRA
Code.Description: Counterparty has been contacted or contacted us, and does not recognise the transaction

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Trade date does not match

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Forfeit amount does not match.

Code.Name: FRAP
Code.Description: Payment type does not match: your instruction is free of payment, your counterparty's instruction is against payment or vice versa

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving agent (counterparty) does not match

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving custodian does not match

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Buyer (receiver) or seller (deliverer) does not match

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Common reference does not match

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: The place of safekeeping information does not allow matching to take place.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Investor party does not match.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline

Code.Name: MIME
Code.Description: Market side execution details are missing.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Counterparty is for settlement through Letter of Guarantee (L/G), your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative for details

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Settlement amount currency does not match

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Matching process has not yet started

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is physical settlement, your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Place of trade does not match

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Place of listing does not match.

Code.Name: PODU
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched. It is a possible duplicate instruction

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Registration details linked to the transaction are incorrect

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Termination transaction amount does not match.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Repurchase rate does not match.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Premium amount does not match.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Repurchase rate type does not match.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Counterparty is for Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) system, you are for non-RTGS or vice versa

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Safekeeping account used as matching criteria on the market concerned does not match. This includes Buyer/seller's account, direct client's account at the receiving/delivering agent, or receiving/delivering agent's account at the CSD

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction type does not match (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method does not match (eg, instruction is to settle using settlement system/method A. Counterparty expects settlement to occur using settlement system/method B)

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Closing date/time does not match(repo).

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Disagreement on the tax status of the financial instruments to be settled

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Variable rate support does not match

Code.Name: UNBR
Code.Description: Market side trade is unmatched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PENF and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA

Code.Name: AWMO

Code.Name: BATC

Code.Name: BYIY

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting financial instruments from a corporate action issue or other procedure, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting

Code.Name: CANR

Code.Name: DENO

Code.Name: DEPO

Code.Name: IAAD

Code.Name: NARR

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REPR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: BATC

Code.Name: CADE

Code.Name: CAEV

Code.Name: CASH

Code.Name: CASY

Code.Name: DDAT

Code.Name: DDEA

Code.Name: DEPT

Code.Name: DMON

Code.Name: DQUA

Code.Name: DTRD

Code.Name: ICAG

Code.Name: ICUS

Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid letter of guarantee indicator instructed.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of trade.

Code.Name: REFE
Code.Description: Instruction has a reference identical to another previously received instruction.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid termination transaction amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid premium amount.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.DetailedName: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed
Code.Description: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG).

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Required stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: ASRF, CLCI, CLTR, COMM, CORP, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TCTR, TRCI, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of trade is a stock exchange

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of trade is over the counter

Code.Name: PRIM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the primary market

Code.Name: SECM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the secondary market.

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Trade was executed on various places.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is SAFE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SAFE, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Narrative (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, for example, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03).
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
If Qualifier is SETR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BSBK
Code.Description: Relates to a buy sell back transaction

Code.Name: BYIY
Code.Description: The transaction relates to a buy-in by the market following a delivery transaction failure.

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction resulting from a market claim.

Code.Name: CNCB
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral delivery/receipt to a National Central Bank for central bank credit operations

Code.Name: COLI
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral taker or its agent.

Code.Name: COLO
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral giver or its agent.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Relates to a depository receipt conversion

Code.Name: ETFT
Code.Description: Relates to an exchange traded fund (ETF) creation or redemption.

Code.Name: FCTA
Code.Description: Relates to a factor update.

Code.Name: INSP
Code.Description: Relates to a movement of shares into or out of a pooled account

Code.Name: ISSU
Code.Description: Relates to the issuance of a security such as an equity or a depository receipt

Code.Name: MKDW
Code.Description: Relates to the decrease of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corp. event realigned)

Code.Name: MKUP
Code.Description: Relates to the increase of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corporate event realigned)

Code.Name: NETT
Code.Description: Relates to the netting of settlement instructions.

Code.Name: NSYN
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of medium and short term paper (CP, CD, MTN, notes...) under a program and without syndication arrangement

Code.Name: OWNE
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving more than one instructing party (messages sender) and/or account servicer (messages receiver)

Code.Name: OWNI
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving one instructing party (messages sender) at one account servicer (messages receiver)

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a pair-off: the transaction is paired off and netted against one or more previous transactions

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Relates to the placement/new issue of a financial instrument

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: Relates to a portfolio move from one investment manager to another and/or from an account servicer to another. It is generally charged differently than another account transfer (OWNE, OWNI, INSP), hence the need to identify this type of transfer as such

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Transaction is a pre-advice, i.e. for matching purposes only

Code.Name: REAL
Code.Description: Relates to a realignment of positions

Code.Name: REDI
Code.Description: Relates to the withdrawal of specified amounts from specified sub-accounts

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Relates to a redemption of Funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: RELE
Code.Description: Relates to a release (into/from local) of Depository Receipt operation

Code.Name: REPU
Code.Description: Relates to a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Relates to the return of financial instruments resulting from a rejected delivery without matching operation

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: Relates to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SBBK
Code.Description: Relates to a sell buy back transaction.

Code.Name: SBRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a borrowed holding from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SECB
Code.Description: Relates to a securities borrowing operation

Code.Name: SECL
Code.Description: Relates to a securities lending operation

Code.Name: SLRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a holding on loan from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Relates to a subscription to funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: SYND
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of financial instruments through a syndicate of underwriters and a Lead Manager

Code.Name: TBAC
Code.Description: Relates to a To Be Announced (TBA) closing trade

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Relates to the settlement of a trade

Code.Name: TRPO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TRVO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty reverse repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TURN
Code.Description: Relates to a turnaround: the same security is bought and sold to settle the same day, to or from different brokers

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: DELI
Code.Description: Financial Instruments will be debited from the safekeeping account

Code.Name: RECE
Code.Description: Financial Instruments will be credited to the safekeeping account

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAEV and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ACCU
Code.Description: Funds related event in which the income (for example accumulation units) that accrues during an accounting period is retained within the fund instead of being paid away to investors. The retained income is nonetheless deemed to have been distributed to investors for tax purposes.

Code.Name: ACTV
Code.Description: Trading in the security has commenced or security has been re-activated after a suspension in trading.

Code.Name: ATTI
Code.Description: Combination of different security types to create a unit. Units are usually comprised of warrants and bonds or warrants and equities. Securities may be combined at the request of the security holder or based on market convention

Code.Name: BIDS
Code.Description: Offer to existing holders by the issuing company to repurchase its own securities. The objective of the offer is to reduce the number of outstanding securities

Code.Name: BMET
Code.Description: Physical meeting of bond holders.

Code.Name: BONU
Code.Description: Security holders receive additional assets free of payment from the issuer, in proportion to their holding

Code.Name: BPUT
Code.Description: Early redemption of a security at the election of the holder subject to the terms and condition of the issue with no reduction in nominal value .

Code.Name: BRUP
Code.Description: Legal status of a company unable to pay creditors. Bankruptcy involves formal court ruling. Securities may become valueless

Code.Name: CAPD
Code.Description: The Corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the Capital account. There is no reduction to the face value of a single share (or the share has no par value). The number of circulating shares remains unchanged.

Code.Name: CAPG
Code.Description: Distribution of profits resulting from the sale of company assets, for example, Shareholders of Mutual Funds, Unit Trusts, or Sicavs are recipients of capital gains distributions which are often reinvested in additional shares of the fund.

Code.Name: CAPI
Code.Description: Increase of the current principal of a debt instrument without increasing the nominal value. It normally arises from the incorporation of due but unpaid interest into the principal. This is commonly done by increasing the pool factor value, for example, capitalisation, and negative amortisation.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Non-US beneficial owner certification requirement for exchange of temporary to permanent notes.

Code.Name: CHAN
Code.Description: Information regarding a change further described in the corporate action details.

Code.Name: CLSA
Code.Description: Situation where interested parties seek restitution for financial loss. The security holder may be offered the opportunity to join a class action proceeding and would need to respond with an instruction.

Code.Name: CMET
Code.Description: Announcement of a meeting at a Court.

Code.Name: CONS
Code.Description: Procedure that aims to obtain consent of holder to a proposal by the issuer or a third party without convening a meeting. For example, consent to change the terms of a bond.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Conversion of securities (generally convertible bonds or preferred shares), into another form of securities (usually common shares) at a pre-stated price/ratio

Code.Name: COOP
Code.Description: A Company Option may be granted by the company, allowing the holder to take up shares at some future date(s) at a pre arranged price in the company. A company may not grant options which enable the holder to take up unissued shares at a time which is five or more years from the date of the grant. Option holders are not members of a company. They are contingent creditors of a company and hence may, in some instances, be entitled to vote on and be bound by a scheme of arrangement between the creditors and the company. As many options have multiple exercise periods a company option will either lapse or carry on to the next expiry date

Code.Name: CREV
Code.Description: An occurrence of credit derivative for which the issuer of one or several underlying securities is unable to fulfil his financial obligations (as defined in terms and conditions).

Code.Name: DECR
Code.Description: Reduction of face value of a single share or the value of fund assets . The number of circulating shares/units remains unchanged. This event may include a cash payout to holders.

Code.Name: DETI
Code.Description: Separation of components that comprise a security, eg, usually units comprised of warrants and bond or warrants and equity . Units may be broken up at the request of the security holder or based on market convention

Code.Name: DFLT
Code.Description: Failure by the company to perform obligations defined as default events under the bond agreement and that have not been remedied.

Code.Name: DLST
Code.Description: Security is no longer able to comply with the listing requirements of a stock exchange and is removed from official board quotation

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before the scheduled final maturity date. It is done without any pool factor reduction. The redemption is reflected in a debit of the face amount (FAMT). Drawing is distinct from partial call since drawn bonds are chosen by lottery. Therefore, not every holder is affected in the same way.

Code.Name: DRCA
Code.DetailedName: Cash Distribution From Non-Eligible Securities Sales
Code.Description: Distribution to shareholders of cash resulting from the selling of non-eligible securities, for example, in the frame of a depositary receipt program.

Code.Name: DRIP
Code.Description: Dividend payment where holders can keep cash or have the cash reinvested in the market by the issuer into additional shares in the issuing company. To be distinguished from DVOP as the company invests the dividend in the market rather than creating new share capital in exchange for the dividend

Code.Name: DSCL
Code.Description: Requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer.

Code.Name: DTCH
Code.Description: An action by a party wishing to acquire a security. Holders of the security are invited to make an offer to sell, within a specific price range. The acquiring party will buy from the holder with lowest offer

Code.Name: DVCA
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to shareholders, in proportion to their equity holding. Ordinary dividends are recurring and regular. Shareholder must take cash and may be offered a choice of currency.

Code.Name: DVOP
Code.Description: Distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive. Shareholders may choose to receive shares or cash. To be distinguished from DRIP as the company creates new share capital in exchange for the dividend rather than investing the dividend in the market.

Code.Name: DVSC
Code.Description: Dividend or interest paid in the form of scrip

Code.Name: DVSE
Code.Description: Dividend paid to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation

Code.Name: EXOF
Code.Description: Exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash. The exchange can be either mandatory or voluntary involving the exchange of outstanding securities for different securities and/or cash. For example "exchange offer", "capital reorganisation" or "funds separation"

Code.Name: EXRI
Code.Description: Call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI). This code is used for the second event, when an intermediate securities'issue (rights/coupons) is composed of two events, the first event being the distribution of intermediate securities

Code.Name: EXTM
Code.Description: As stipulated in the security's Terms and Conditions, the issuer or the holder may prolong the maturity date of a security. After extension, the security details may differ from the original issue. An issuer initiated extension may be subject to holder's approval.

Code.Name: EXWA
Code.Description: Option to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of equities, cash, commodity, etc, at a predetermined price over a specific period of time

Code.Name: INCR
Code.Description: Increase in the face value of a single security. The number of circulating securities remains unchanged

Code.Name: INFO
Code.Description: Information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder.

Code.Name: INTR
Code.Description: Interest payment distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: A distribution of cash, assets or both. Debt may be paid in order of priority based on preferred claims to assets specified by the security

Code.Name: MCAL
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager. before final maturity.

Code.Name: MEET
Code.Description: Annual general meeting.

Code.Name: MRGR
Code.Description: Exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, ie, an external, third party company . Cash payments may accompany share exchange

Code.Name: NOOF
Code.Description: Offers that are not supervised or regulated by an official entity and being offered by a party, for example a broker, usually at a discount price, for example broker offer, mini-tender, mini odd lot offer or third party offer.

Code.Name: ODLT
Code.Description: Sale or purchase of odd-lots to/from the issuing company, initiated either by the holder of the security or through an offer made by the issuer

Code.Name: OMET
Code.Description: Ordinary general meeting.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other event, use only when no other event type applies, eg, a new event type.

Code.Name: PARI
Code.Description: Occurs when securities with different characteristics, eg, shares with different entitlements to dividend or voting rights, become identical in all respects, eg , pari-passu or assimilation . May be scheduled in advance, eg, shares resulting from a bonus may become fungible after a pre-set period of time, or may result from outside events, eg, merger, reorganisation, issue of supplementary tranches, etc

Code.Name: PCAL
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption Without Pool Factor Reduction
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date. It is done without any pool factor reduction. The redemption is reflected in a debit of the face amount (FAMT).

Code.Name: PDEF
Code.Description: Issuer has money set aside to redeem a portion of an issue and the indenture states that the securities could be called earlier than the stated maturity

Code.Name: PINK
Code.Description: Interest payment, in any kind except cash, distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Changes in the state of incorporation for US companies and changes in the place of incorporation for foreign companies. Where shares need to be registered following the incorporation change, the holder(s) may have to elect the registrar

Code.Name: PPMT
Code.Description: An instalment towards the purchase of equity capital, subject to an agreement between an issuer and a purchaser

Code.Name: PRED
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption With Pool Factor Reduction
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date. The redemption is reflected in a pool factor reduction. No movement of securities occurs.

Code.Name: PRII
Code.Description: An event which consists of two components, the decrease of the amortized value of a pool factor security and an interest payment

Code.Name: PRIO
Code.Description: Form of open or public offer where priority is given to existing shareholders due to limited amount of securities available in the offer. Shareholders can buy a type of security during a short period of time

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager,at final maturity.

Code.Name: REDO
Code.Description: Event by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated, eg, nominal/par value of security in a national currency is restated in another currency.

Code.Name: REMK
Code.Description: Purchase and sale of remarketed preferred equities/bonds through the negotiation of interest rate between the issuers and the holders

Code.Name: RHDI
Code.Description: The distribution of intermediate securities that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event

Code.Name: RHTS
Code.Description: Offer to holders of a security to subscribe for additional securities via the distribution of an intermediate security. Both processes are included in the same event.

Code.Name: SHPR
Code.Description: This corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve. It is similar to a dividend but with different tax implications.

Code.Name: SMAL
Code.Description: Modification of the smallest negotiable unit of shares in order to obtain a new negotiable unit

Code.Name: SOFF
Code.Description: A distribution of securities issued by another company. The distributed securities may either be of a newly created or of an existing company. For example, spin-off, demerger, unbundling, divestment.

Code.Name: SPLF
Code.Description: Increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are reduced accordingly

Code.Name: SPLR
Code.DetailedName: Reverse Stock Split/Change in Nominal Value
Code.Description: Decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are increased accordingly

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading in the security has been suspended.

Code.Name: TEND
Code.Description: An offer made to holders by a third party, requesting them to sell (tender) or exchange their securities

Code.Name: TREC
Code.Description: Event related to tax reclaim activities.

Code.Name: WRTH
Code.Description: Booking out of valueless securities.

Code.Name: WTRC
Code.Description: Certification process for withholding tax reduction or exemption based on the tax status of the holder.

Code.Name: XMET
Code.Description: Extraordinary or special general meeting.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PAYM, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: APMT
Code.Description: Against payment.

Code.Name: FREE
Code.Description: Free of payment.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is TRAN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BOLE
Code.Description: Transaction relates to lending/borrowing

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction relates to a market claim following a corporate action

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction relates to collateral

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Transaction relates to corporate action

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Transaction relates to settlement and clearing

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ASGN
Code.Description: Transfer ownership of the asset to another party.

Code.Name: BUTC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction is a buy to cover

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Tax-exempt financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Taxable financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DLWM
Code.Description: Matching receipt instruction not required (only for concerned ICSD and CSD).

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Settlement transactions relates to drawn securities

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are exercised.

Code.Name: EXPI
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that have expired.

Code.Name: FRCL
Code.Description: Delivery will be made free of payment but a clean payment order will be sent

Code.Name: KNOC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are expired worthless

Code.Name: NACT
Code.Description: Security transaction is not for accounting

Code.Name: NOMC
Code.Description: No market claim should be automatically generated.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PENS
Code.Description: Accounting information that the position to cover the pending sale will be available by contractual settlement date.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled

Code.Name: RESI
Code.Description: Relates to transaction on a security that is not eligible at the Central Securities Depository (CSD) but for which the payment will be enacted by the CSD

Code.Name: RHYP
Code.Description: Collateral position is available for other purposes (for example, onwards delivery).

Code.Name: RPTO
Code.Description: Relates to a transaction that is for reporting purposes only.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction will create a short position

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery

Code.Name: SPST
Code.Description: Money and financial instruments settle in different locations

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Transaction resulting from a transformation.

Code.Name: UNEX
Code.Description: Delivery cannot be performed until money is received

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TRCA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Settlement party is a custodian. It receives/delivers the securities and carries out custodial duties

Code.Name: RISP
Code.Description: Party settles trades that were simultaneously offset.

Code.Name: SAGE
Code.Description: Party settles trades on behalf of his client for which he also traded

Code.Name: SPRI
Code.Description: Party settles its own trades

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BENE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NBEN
Code.Description: No Change of Beneficial Ownership (NCBO). If a standing instruction is in place for change of beneficial ownership (CBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YBEN
Code.Description: Change of Beneficial Ownership (CBO). If a standing instruction is in place for no change of beneficial ownership (NCBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CASY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: GROS
Code.Description: Settle money through gross settlement system

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: Settle money through net settlement system

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TCPI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Acting as an agent for tax liability.

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Acting as a principal for tax liability.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is REPT, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a repo collateral substitution

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Relates to the early closing/maturity date for a term repo or the termination date of an open repo with underlying collateral

Code.Name: PADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a principal adjustment

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a repo that is part of a pair-off

Code.Name: RATE
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the repo rate.

Code.Name: ROLP
Code.Description: Relates to a repo rollover of a contract extending the closing or maturity date without impacting underlying collateral .

Code.Name: TOPU
Code.Description: Relates to a cover of securities position due to deficit of collateral following mark to market valuation

Code.Name: WTHD
Code.Description: Relates to a return of securities position due to excess of collateral following mark to market valuation

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is MACL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CLNT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a client side transaction

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a market side transaction

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BLOC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BLCH
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade child

Code.Name: BLPA
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade parent

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: 144A
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of an unregistered security issued, pursuant to US legal restrictions 144A.

Code.Name: NRST
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is not subject to restrictions

Code.Name: RSTR
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is subject to restrictions, and not pursuant to 144A

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is SETS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NSET
Code.Description: Settle through the default settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the alternate settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YSET
Code.Description: Settle through the alternate settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the default settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is NETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not eligible for netting

Code.Name: YNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is eligible for netting

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CCPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not CCP eligible

Code.Name: YCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is CCP eligible

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is LEOG and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is not accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place not to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
In option B, if Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: OPEN
Code.Description: Date has not been established

Code.Name: UKWN
Code.Description: Date is unknown.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: ASRF, CLCI, CLTR, COMM, CORP, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, RELA, TCTR, TRCI, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26)
In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of trade is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of trade is over the counter.

Code.Name: PRIM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the primary market.

Code.Name: SECM
Code.Description: Place of trade is the secondary market.

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Trade was executed on various places.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is SAFE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is SAFE, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Narrative (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, for example, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52)
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03)
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero(Error code(s): T14)
If Qualifier is SETR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BSBK
Code.Description: Relates to a buy sell back transaction

Code.Name: BYIY
Code.Description: The transaction relates to a buy-in by the market following a delivery transaction failure.

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction resulting from a market claim.

Code.Name: CNCB
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral delivery/receipt to a National Central Bank for central bank credit operations

Code.Name: COLI
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral taker or its agent

Code.Name: COLO
Code.Description: Relates to a collateral transaction, form the point of view of the collateral giver or its agent

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Relates to a depository receipt conversion

Code.Name: ETFT
Code.Description: Relates to an exchange traded fund (ETF) creation or redemption.

Code.Name: FCTA
Code.Description: Relates to a factor update.

Code.Name: INSP
Code.Description: Relates to a movement of shares into or out of a pooled account

Code.Name: ISSU
Code.Description: Relates to the issuance of a security such as an equity or a depository receipt

Code.Name: MKDW
Code.Description: Relates to the decrease of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corp. event realigned)

Code.Name: MKUP
Code.Description: Relates to the increase of positions held by an ICSD at the common depository due to custody operations (repurchase, pre-release, proceed of corporate event realigned)

Code.Name: NETT
Code.Description: Relates to the netting of settlement instructions.

Code.Name: NSYN
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of medium and short term paper (CP, CD, MTN, notes...) under a program and without syndication arrangement

Code.Name: OWNE
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving more than one instructing party (messages sender) and/or account servicer (messages receiver)

Code.Name: OWNI
Code.Description: Relates to an account transfer involving one instructing party (messages sender) at one account servicer (messages receiver)

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a pair-off: the transaction is paired off and netted against one or more previous transactions

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Relates to the placement/new issue of a financial instrument

Code.Name: PORT
Code.Description: Relates to a portfolio move from one investment manager to another and/or from an account servicer to another. It is generally charged differently than another account transfer (OWNE, OWNI, INSP), hence the need to identify this type of transfer as such

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Transaction is a pre-advice, i.e. for matching purposes only

Code.Name: REAL
Code.Description: Relates to a realignment of positions

Code.Name: REDI
Code.Description: Relates to the withdrawal of specified amounts from specified sub-accounts

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Relates to a redemption of Funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: RELE
Code.Description: Relates to a release (into/from local) of Depository Receipt operation

Code.Name: REPU
Code.Description: Relates to a repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Relates to the return of financial instruments resulting from a rejected delivery without matching operation

Code.Name: RVPO
Code.Description: Relates to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

Code.Name: SBBK
Code.Description: Relates to a sell buy back transaction.

Code.Name: SBRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a borrowed holding from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SECB
Code.Description: Relates to a securities borrowing operation

Code.Name: SECL
Code.Description: Relates to a securities lending operation

Code.Name: SLRE
Code.Description: Internal reallocation of a holding on loan from one safekeeping account to another.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Relates to a subscription to funds (Funds Industry ONLY).

Code.Name: SYND
Code.Description: Relates to the issue of financial instruments through a syndicate of underwriters and a Lead Manager

Code.Name: TBAC
Code.Description: Relates to a To Be Announced (TBA) closing trade

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Relates to the settlement of a trade

Code.Name: TRPO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty repurchase agreement.

Code.Name: TRVO
Code.Description: Relates to a triparty reverse repurchase agreement

Code.Name: TURN
Code.Description: Relates to a turnaround: the same security is bought and sold to settle the same day, to or from different brokers

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: DELI
Code.Description: Financial Instruments will be debited from the safekeeping account

Code.Name: RECE
Code.Description: Financial Instruments will be credited to the safekeeping account

Validation.Comment: In option F,If Qualifier is CAEV and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ACCU
Code.Description: Funds related event in which the income (for example accumulation units) that accrues during an accounting period is retained within the fund instead of being paid away to investors. The retained income is nonetheless deemed to have been distributed to investors for tax purposes.

Code.Name: ACTV
Code.Description: Trading in the security has commenced or security has been re-activated after a suspension in trading.

Code.Name: ATTI
Code.Description: Combination of different security types to create a unit. Units are usually comprised of warrants and bonds or warrants and equities. Securities may be combined at the request of the security holder or based on market convention

Code.Name: BIDS
Code.Description: Offer to existing holders by the issuing company to repurchase its own securities. The objective of the offer is to reduce the number of outstanding securities

Code.Name: BMET
Code.Description: Physical meeting of bond holders.

Code.Name: BONU
Code.Description: Security holders receive additional assets free of payment from the issuer, in proportion to their holding

Code.Name: BPUT
Code.Description: Early redemption of a security at the election of the holder subject to the terms and condition of the issue with no reduction in nominal value .

Code.Name: BRUP
Code.Description: Legal status of a company unable to pay creditors. Bankruptcy involves a formal court ruling. Securities may become valueless

Code.Name: CAPD
Code.Description: The Corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the Capital account. There is no reduction to the face value of a single share (or the share has no par value). The number of circulating shares remains unchanged.

Code.Name: CAPG
Code.Description: Distribution of profits resulting from the sale of company assets, for example, Shareholders of Mutual Funds, Unit Trusts, or Sicavs are recipients of capital gains distributions which are often reinvested in additional shares of the fund.

Code.Name: CAPI
Code.Description: Increase of the current principal of a debt instrument without increasing the nominal value. It normally arises from the incorporation of due but unpaid interest into the principal. This is commonly done by increasing the pool factor value, for example, capitalisation, and negative amortisation.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Non-US beneficial owner certification requirement for exchange of temporary to permanent notes.

Code.Name: CHAN
Code.Description: Information regarding a change further described in the corporate action details.

Code.Name: CLSA
Code.Description: Situation where interested parties seek restitution for financial loss. The security holder may be offered the opportunity to join a class action proceeding and would need to respond with an instruction.

Code.Name: CMET
Code.Description: Announcement of a meeting at a Court.

Code.Name: CONS
Code.Description: Procedure that aims to obtain consent of holder to a proposal by the issuer or a third party without convening a meeting. For example, consent to change the terms of a bond.

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Conversion of securities (generally convertible bonds or preferred shares), into another form of securities (usually common shares) at a pre-stated price/ratio

Code.Name: COOP
Code.Description: A Company Option may be granted by the company, allowing the holder to take up shares at some future date(s) at a pre arranged price in the company. A company may not grant options which enable the holder to take up unissued shares at a time which is five or more years from the date of the grant. Option holders are not members of a company. They are contingent creditors of a company and hence may, in some instances, be entitled to vote on and be bound by a scheme of arrangement between the creditors and the company. As many options have multiple exercise periods a company option will either lapse or carry on to the next expiry date

Code.Name: CREV
Code.Description: An occurrence of credit derivative for which the issuer of one or several underlying securities is unable to fulfil his financial obligations (as defined in terms and conditions).

Code.Name: DECR
Code.Description: Reduction of face value of a single share or the value of fund assets . The number of circulating shares/units remains unchanged. This event may include a cash payout to holders.

Code.Name: DETI
Code.Description: Separation of components that comprise a security, eg, usually units comprised of warrants and bond or warrants and equity . Units may be broken up at the request of the security holder or based on market convention

Code.Name: DFLT
Code.Description: Failure by the company to perform obligations defined as default events under the bond agreement and that have not been remedied.

Code.Name: DLST
Code.Description: Security is no longer able to comply with the listing requirements of a stock exchange and is removed from official board quotation

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before the scheduled final maturity date. It is done without any pool factor reduction. The redemption is reflected in a debit of the face amount (FAMT). Drawing is distinct from partial call since drawn bonds are chosen by lottery. Therefore, not every holder is affected in the same way.

Code.Name: DRCA
Code.DetailedName: Cash Distribution From Non-Eligible Securities Sales
Code.Description: Distribution to shareholders of cash resulting from the selling of non-eligible securities, for example, in the frame of a depositary receipt program.

Code.Name: DRIP
Code.Description: Dividend payment where holders can keep cash or have the cash reinvested in the market by the issuer into additional shares in the issuing company. To be distinguished from DVOP as the company invests the dividend in the market rather than creating new share capital in exchange for the dividend

Code.Name: DSCL
Code.Description: Requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer.

Code.Name: DTCH
Code.Description: An action by a party wishing to acquire a security. Holders of the security are invited to make an offer to sell, within a specific price range. The acquiring party will buy from the holder with lowest offer

Code.Name: DVCA
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to shareholders, in proportion to their equity holding. Ordinary dividends are recurring and regular. Shareholder must take cash and may be offered a choice of currency.

Code.Name: DVOP
Code.Description: Distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive. Shareholders may choose to receive shares or cash. To be distinguished from DRIP as the company creates new share capital in exchange for the dividend rather than investing the dividend in the market.

Code.Name: DVSC
Code.Description: Dividend or interest paid in the form of scrip

Code.Name: DVSE
Code.Description: Dividend paid to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation

Code.Name: EXOF
Code.Description: Exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash. The exchange can be either mandatory or voluntary involving the exchange of outstanding securities for different securities and/or cash. For example "exchange offer" , "capital reorganisation" or "funds separation"

Code.Name: EXRI
Code.Description: Call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI). This code is used for the second event, when an intermediate securities'issue (rights/coupons) is composed of two events, the first event being the distribution of intermediate securities

Code.Name: EXTM
Code.Description: As stipulated in the security's Terms and Conditions, the issuer or the holder may prolong the maturity date of a security. After extension, the security details may differ from the original issue. An issuer initiated extension may be subject to holder's approval.

Code.Name: EXWA
Code.Description: Option to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of equities, cash, commodity, etc, at a predetermined price over a specific period of time

Code.Name: INCR
Code.Description: Increase in the face value of a single security. The number of circulating securities remains unchanged

Code.Name: INFO
Code.Description: Information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder.

Code.Name: INTR
Code.Description: Interest payment distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: A distribution of cash, assets or both. Debt may be paid in order of priority based on preferred claims to assets specified by the security

Code.Name: MCAL
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, before final maturity.

Code.Name: MEET
Code.Description: Annual general meeting.

Code.Name: MRGR
Code.Description: Exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, ie, an external, third party company . Cash payments may accompany share exchange

Code.Name: NOOF
Code.Description: Offers that are not supervised or regulated by an official entity and being offered by a party, for example a broker, usually at a discount price, for example broker offer, mini-tender, mini odd lot offer or third party offer.

Code.Name: ODLT
Code.Description: Sale or purchase of odd-lots to/from the issuing company, initiated either by the holder of the security or through an offer made by the issuer

Code.Name: OMET
Code.Description: Ordinary general meeting.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other event, use only when no other event type applies, eg, a new event type.

Code.Name: PARI
Code.Description: Occurs when securities with different characteristics, eg, shares with different entitlements to dividend or voting rights, become identical in all respects, eg , pari-passu or assimilation . May be scheduled in advance, eg, shares resulting from a bonus may become fungible after a pre-set period of time, or may result from outside events, eg, merger, reorganisation, issue of supplementary tranches, etc

Code.Name: PCAL
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption Without Pool Factor Reduction
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date. It is done without any pool factor reduction. The redemption is reflected in a debit of the face amount (FAMT).

Code.Name: PDEF
Code.Description: Issuer has money set aside to redeem a portion of an issue and the indenture states that the securities could be called earlier than the stated maturity

Code.Name: PINK
Code.Description: Interest payment, in any kind except cash, distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Changes in the state of incorporation for US companies and changes in the place of incorporation for foreign companies. Where shares need to be registered following the incorporation change, the holder(s) may have to elect the registrar

Code.Name: PPMT
Code.Description: An instalment towards the purchase of equity capital, subject to an agreement between an issuer and a purchaser

Code.Name: PRED
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption With Pool Factor Reduction
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date. The redemption is reflected in a pool factor reduction. No movement of securities occurs.

Code.Name: PRII
Code.Description: An event which consists of two components, the decrease of the amortized value of a pool factor security and an interest payment

Code.Name: PRIO
Code.Description: Form of open or public offer where priority is given to existing shareholders due to limited amount of securities available in the offer. Shareholders can buy a type of security during a short period of time

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, at final maturity

Code.Name: REDO
Code.Description: Event by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated, eg, nominal/par value of security in a national currency is restated in another currency

Code.Name: REMK
Code.Description: Purchase and sale of remarketed preferred equities/bonds through the negotiation of interest rate between the issuers and the holders

Code.Name: RHDI
Code.Description: The distribution of intermediate securities that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event

Code.Name: RHTS
Code.Description: Offer to holders of a security to subscribe for additional securities via the distribution of an intermediate security. Both processes are included in the same event

Code.Name: SHPR
Code.Description: This corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve. It is similar to a dividend but with different tax implications.

Code.Name: SMAL
Code.Description: Modification of the smallest negotiable unit of shares in order to obtain a new negotiable unit

Code.Name: SOFF
Code.Description: A distribution of securities issued by another company. The distributed securities may either be of a newly created or of an existing company. For example, spin-off, demerger, unbundling, divestment.

Code.Name: SPLF
Code.Description: Increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are reduced accordingly

Code.Name: SPLR
Code.DetailedName: Reverse Stock Split/Change in Nominal Value
Code.Description: Decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are increased accordingly

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading in the security has been suspended.

Code.Name: TEND
Code.Description: An offer made to holders by a third party, requesting them to sell (tender) or exchange their securities.

Code.Name: TREC
Code.Description: Event related to tax reclaim activities.

Code.Name: WRTH
Code.Description: Booking out of valueless securities.

Code.Name: WTRC
Code.Description: Certification process for withholding tax reduction or exemption based on the tax status of the holder.

Code.Name: XMET
