Code.Description: Extraordinary or special general meeting.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PAYM, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: APMT
Code.Description: Against payment.

Code.Name: FREE
Code.Description: Free of payment.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is TRAN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BOLE
Code.Description: Transaction relates to lending/borrowing

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction relates to a market claim following a corporate action

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction relates to collateral

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Transaction relates to corporate action

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Transaction relates to settlement and clearing

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ASGN
Code.Description: Transfer ownership of the asset to another party.

Code.Name: BUTC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction is a buy to cover

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Tax-exempt financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Taxable financial instruments are to be settled.

Code.Name: DLWM
Code.Description: Matching receipt instruction not required (only for concerned ICSD and CSD).

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Settlement transactions relates to drawn securities

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are exercised.

Code.Name: EXPI
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that have expired.

Code.Name: FRCL
Code.Description: Delivery will be made free of payment but a clean payment order will be sent

Code.Name: KNOC
Code.Description: Settlement transaction relates to options, futures or derivatives that are expired worthless

Code.Name: NACT
Code.Description: Security transaction is not for accounting.

Code.Name: NOMC
Code.Description: No market claim should be automatically generated.

Code.Name: NPAR
Code.Description: Partial settlement is not allowed.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Partial settlement is allowed.

Code.Name: PENS
Code.Description: Accounting information that the position to cover the pending sale will be available by contractual settlement date.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Securities are to be physically settled

Code.Name: RESI
Code.Description: Relates to transaction on a security that is not eligible at the Central Securities Depository (CSD) but for which the payment will be enacted by the CSD

Code.Name: RHYP
Code.Description: Collateral position is available for other purposes (for example, onwards delivery).

Code.Name: RPTO
Code.Description: Relates to a transaction that is for reporting purposes only.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction will create a short position

Code.Name: SPDL
Code.Description: Settlement transactions to be settled with special delivery

Code.Name: SPST
Code.Description: Money and financial instruments settle in different locations

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Transaction resulting from a transformation.

Code.Name: UNEX
Code.Description: Delivery cannot be performed until money is received

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TRCA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Settlement party is a custodian. It receives/delivers the securities and carries out custodial duties

Code.Name: RISP
Code.Description: Party settles trades that were simultaneously offset.

Code.Name: SAGE
Code.Description: Party settles trades on behalf of his client for which he also traded

Code.Name: SPRI
Code.Description: Party settles its own trades

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is RTGS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the non-RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the RTGS instruction, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YRTG
Code.Description: Settle through the RTGS system. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the non-RTGS system, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is REGT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NREG
Code.Description: Hold the securities in street name. If there is a standing instruction in place to register on receipt, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YREG
Code.Description: Register on receipt. If there is a standing instruction in place to hold the securities in street name, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BENE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NBEN
Code.Description: No Change of Beneficial Ownership (NCBO). If a standing instruction is in place for change of beneficial ownership (CBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YBEN
Code.Description: Change of Beneficial Ownership (CBO). If a standing instruction is in place for no change of beneficial ownership (NCBO), then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CASY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: GROS
Code.Description: Settle money through gross settlement system

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: Settle money through net settlement system

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TCPI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Acting as an agent for tax liability.

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Acting as a principal for tax liability.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is REPT, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a repo collateral substitution

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Relates to the early closing/maturity date for a term repo or the termination date of an open repo with underlying collateral

Code.Name: PADJ
Code.Description: Relates to a principal adjustment

Code.Name: PAIR
Code.Description: Relates to a repo that is part of a pair-off

Code.Name: RATE
Code.Description: Relates to a change in the repo rate.

Code.Name: ROLP
Code.Description: Relates to a repo rollover of a contract extending the closing or maturity date without impacting underlying collateral .

Code.Name: TOPU
Code.Description: Relates to a cover of securities position due to deficit of collateral following mark to market valuation

Code.Name: WTHD
Code.Description: Relates to a return of securities position due to excess of collateral following mark to market valuation

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is MACL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CLNT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a client side transaction

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Instruction is for a market side transaction

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BLOC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BLCH
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade child

Code.Name: BLPA
Code.Description: Transaction is a block trade parent

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: 144A
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of an unregistered security issued, pursuant to US legal restrictions 144A.

Code.Name: NRST
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is not subject to restrictions

Code.Name: RSTR
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is subject to restrictions, and not pursuant to 144A

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is SETS and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NSET
Code.Description: Settle through the default settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the alternate settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YSET
Code.Description: Settle through the alternate settlement system/method. If there is a standing instruction in place for settlement through the default settlement system/method, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is NETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is not eligible for netting

Code.Name: YNET
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is eligible for netting

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CCPT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NCCP
Code.Description: TSettlement instruction is not CCP eligible

Code.Name: YCCP
Code.Description: Settlement instruction is CCP eligible

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is LEOG and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: NLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is not accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Code.Name: YLEG
Code.Description: Letter of guarantee is accepted. If there is a standing instruction in place not to accept a letter of guarantee, then this standing instruction is to be ignored

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
In option B, if Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: OPEN
Code.Description: Date has not been established

Code.Name: UKWN
Code.Description: Date is unknown.

Validation.Comment: In option B, if Qualifier is TRAD and Data Source Scheme is not present, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, PSET, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Validation.Qualifiers: BUYR, DEAG, DECU, DEI1, DEI2, REAG, RECU, REI1, REI2, SELL
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: A cancellation request from yourself for this instruction is pending, waiting for further processing

Code.Name: CGEN
Code.Description: The transaction was created by the account servicer or a third party. It was not instructed directly by the account owner

Code.Name: CPRC
Code.Description: A cancellation request from your counterparty for this transaction is pending, waiting for your cancellation request

Code.Name: MPRC
Code.Description: A modification request from your counterparty for this transaction is pending waiting for your modification request or your consent.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged by the account servicer

Code.Name: PPRC
Code.Description: Processing of the instruction is pending.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted but in repair.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MTCH or INMH and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: MACH
Code.Description: Instruction has been matched.

Code.Name: NMAT
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Instruction is pending. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is still possible

Code.Name: PENF
Code.Description: Instruction is failing. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is no longer possible

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis

Code.Name: AWMO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are delivered, but still awaiting money from counterparty

Code.Name: AWSH
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not yet been received from the counterparty

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Processing batch differs in the counterparty's instruction, eg, daytime/real-time versus overnight

Code.Name: BENO
Code.Description: Disagreement in beneficial ownership

Code.Name: BLOC
Code.Description: Your account is blocked, no instruction can settle over the account

Code.Name: BOTH
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction and your instruction are on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting financial instruments from a corporate action or other procedure, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting

Code.Name: CDLR
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode infrastructure platform is awaiting release.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Certificate number error

Code.Name: CHAS
Code.Description: A chaser/enquiry has been sent

Code.Name: CLAC
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in counterparty's account or counterparty does not hold financial instruments

Code.Name: CLHT
Code.Description: Instructed settlement date does not agree with the settlement date on the Clearing House trade, ie, a specific type of trade in India

Code.Name: CMON
Code.Description: Insufficient money in counterparty's account

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Financial instruments are not deliverable as they are pledged as collateral

Code.Name: CPEC
Code.Description: Counterparty is in receivership (form of bankruptcy where a court appointed person ,the receiver ,manages the affairs of the business)

Code.Name: CSDH
Code.Description: Central securities depository has set the instruction in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode

Code.Name: CVAL
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode as it fulfils predefined conditions of a restriction processing type in the market infrastructure platform.

Code.Name: CYCL
Code.Description: Your instruction is confirmed in the local market or is ready for settlement, awaiting next settlement cycle

Code.Name: DENO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed does not match the denomination available/deliverable. Physical securities need to be obtained in deliverable denominated quantities

Code.Name: DEPO
Code.DetailedName: Refused Deposit for Issue of Depositary Receipts
Code.Description: Deposit of shares for the issuing of Depositary Receipts has been refused. The allotment for Depositary Receipts granted by the issuer is exceeded by your transaction

Code.Name: DISA
Code.Description: Exceptional closing of all financial institutions due to natural disaster, eg, earthquake

Code.Name: DKNY
Code.Description: Counterparty has returned or refuses the securities

Code.Name: DOCC
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from counterparty.

Code.Name: DOCY
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from you.

Code.Name: FLIM
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account as maximum foreign limit has been reached

Code.Name: FROZ
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked at the CSD following a corporate event

Code.Name: FUTU
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement date. No settlement problems to be reported

Code.Name: GLOB
Code.Description: Settlement cannot be executed; financial instruments are in global form

Code.Name: IAAD
Code.Description: Pending reason being investigated

Code.Name: INBC
Code.Description: Not all the instructions part of a pool have been received.

Code.Name: INCA
Code.Description: Financial instruments require income adjustment, eg, dividend or interest

Code.Name: LAAW
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement of a purchase to cover failing positions.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient financial instruments in your account

Code.Name: LALO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are out on loan

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline

Code.Name: LINK
Code.Description: Your instruction is pending settlement because the instruction linked to it is pending

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: Central Bank Liquidity is insufficient

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient money in your account and/or credit line is insufficient

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NCON
Code.Description: Confirmation of settlement has not yet been received

Code.Name: NEWI
Code.Description: Financial instrument is a new issue and not yet available/tradable

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched; matching process is not required

Code.Name: NOFX
Code.Description: A foreign exchange instruction from you is missing

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Trade will settle in partials.

Code.Name: PHCK
Code.Description: Physical financial instruments have been received and are being checked for authenticity

Code.Name: PHSE
Code.Description: Settlement is physical. Financial instruments are being delivered

Code.Name: PRCY
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Your instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode

Code.Name: PRSY
Code.Description: The transaction was put on hold by the system.

Code.Name: REFS
Code.Description: Delivery/receipt was refused because physical financial instruments are not in good order

Code.Name: REFU
Code.Description: Instruction has been refused or not recognised and is represented automatically

Code.Name: REGT
Code.Description: Certificates have been lodged with the registrar but rejected due to incomplete documentation or foreign ownership Limitation reached

Code.Name: SBLO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked due to a corporate action event, realignment, etc

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Stamp duty information is missing

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method has been modified at CSD to allow settlement

Code.Name: TAMM
Code.Description: Trade is being amended in the market.

Code.Name: YCOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral in your account to execute the instruction

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CGEN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to a market claim following a corporate action.

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to transformation following a corporate action.

Code.Name: SPLI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to enable settlement following a shortage of position

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to return a delivery previously instructed

Code.Name: THRD
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated by a third party, eg, a central counterparty

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated for collateral management purposes

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as per your request

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the settlement system

Code.Name: CSUB
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the agent

Code.Name: CTHP
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by a third party.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is NMAT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ACRU
Code.Description: Accrued interest amount does not match

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer's deadline.Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Transaction call delay does not match.

Code.Name: CLAT
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction was too late for matching

Code.Name: CMIS
Code.Description: A matching instruction from your counterparty could not be found

Code.Name: CPCA
Code.Description: Counterparty cancelled their instruction

Code.Name: DCMX
Code.Description: Disagreement if trade was executed cum or ex.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Settlement date/ time does not match

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Deal price does not match

Code.Name: DELN
Code.Description: Direction of the trade does not match. Counterparty expects a delivery from you, not a receipt or vice versa

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Place of settlement does not match

Code.Name: DMCT
Code.Description: Disagreement on automatic generation of market claim or transformation.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Settlement amount does not match

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument does not match

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Financial instrument identification does not match, eg, ISIN differs, Financial Instrument Attributes differs

Code.Name: DTRA
Code.Description: Counterparty has been contacted or contacted us, and does not recognise the transaction

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Trade date does not match

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Forfeit amount does not match.

Code.Name: FRAP
Code.Description: Payment type does not match: your instruction is free of payment, your counterparty's instruction is against payment or vice versa

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving agent (counterparty) does not match

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving custodian does not match

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Buyer (receiver) or seller (deliverer) does not match

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Common reference does not match

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: The place of safekeeping information does not allow matching to take place.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid investor party. May be used by an executing party to reject an instruction for an investor (or portfolio) for which it is not authorised to act.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Counterparty is for settlement through Letter of Guarantee (L/G), your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: MIME
Code.Description: Market side execution details are missing.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative for details

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Settlement amount currency does not match

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Matching process has not yet started

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is physical settlement, your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Place of trade does not match

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of listing. Used when the security identified is not listed on the market supplied.

Code.Name: PODU
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched. It is a possible duplicate instruction

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Registration details linked to the transaction are incorrect

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Termination transaction amount does not match.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Repurchase rate does not match.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Premium amount does not match.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Repurchase rate type does not match.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Counterparty is for Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) system, you are for non-RTGS or vice versa

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Safekeeping account used as matching criteria on the market concerned does not match. This includes Buyer/seller's account, direct client's account at the receiving/delivering agent, or receiving/delivering agent's account at the CSD

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction type does not match (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method does not match (eg, instruction is to settle using settlement system/method A. Counterparty expects settlement to occur using settlement system/method B)

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Closing date/time does not match(repo).

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Disagreement on the tax status of the financial instruments to be settled

Code.Name: UNBR
Code.Description: Market side trade is unmatched.

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Variable rate support does not match.

Code.Name: DDAT

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid trade date.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid buyer or seller.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Common Reference.

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Place of Safekeeping.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid letter of guarantee indicator instructed.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of trade.

Code.Name: REFE
Code.Description: Instruction has a reference identical to another previously received instruction.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid termination transaction amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid premium amount.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.DetailedName: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed
Code.Description: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG).

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Required stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U12
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid format! Format must be 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' where x is any hexadecimal character (lower case only) and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b."

fieldvalidation.name: C1-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A General Information, if the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) indicates no information to be reported, ie, N, then sequence B Status and sequence C Transactions must not be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C1-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) indicates that there is information to be reported, ie, Y and Statement Structure Type Indicator is per statuses (field :22H::STST//STAT), then sequence B Status is mandatory and sequence C Transactions is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C1-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B::ACTI) in sequence A General Information indicates that there is information to be reported, ie, Y and Statement Structure Type Indicator is per transactions (field :22H::STST//TRAN), then sequence B Status is not allowed and sequence C Transactions is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the instruction is a delivery (:22H::REDE//DELI in subsequence B2b) and the Settlement Parties subsequence B2b1 is used, then it is mandatory to specify a receiving agent: one occurrence of Settlement Parties subsequence B2b1 must contain party field :95a::REAG."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the instruction is a receipt (:22H::REDE//RECE in subsequence B2b) and the Settlement Parties subsequence B2b1 is used, then it is mandatory to specify a delivering agent: one occurrence of Settlement Parties subsequence B2b1 must contain party field :95a::DEAG."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the instruction is a delivery (:22H::REDE//DELI in subsequence C2) and the Settlement Parties subsequence C2a is used, then it is mandatory to specify a receiving agent: one occurrence of Settlement Parties subsequence C2a must contain party field :95a::REAG."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-D

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence B2b1, if field :95a::PSET is present, then field :97a::SAFE is not allowed in the same sequence."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence C2a, if field :95a::PSET is present, then field :97a::SAFE is not allowed in the same sequence."

fieldvalidation.name: C8-A
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-A "Within each occurrence of subsequence B1 Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding sequence B Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence B1 Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding sequence B Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."

fieldvalidation.name: C8-B
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-B "Within each occurrence of subsequence C3a Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding Subsequence C3 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence C3a Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding Subsequence C3 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence B2b, field :36B::PSTA cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence C2, field :36B::PSTA cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "A reference to the previously received message must be specified for each transaction reported, i.e. in each occurrence of subsequence B2 Transaction, field :20C::RELA must be present in one and only one occurrence of subsequence B2a Linkages; field :20C::RELA is not allowed in all other occurrences of subsequence B2a."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "A reference to the previously received message must be specified for each transaction reported, i.e. in each occurrence of sequence C Transaction, field :20C::RELA must be present in one and only one occurrence of subsequence C1 Linkages; field :20C::RELA is not allowed in all other occurrences of subsequence C1."

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field :95L::ALTE is present, then field :95a::ACOW must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C12-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence B2b, field :94a::CLEA must not be present more than twice. When repeated, one and only one occurrence must be with format option L (:94L::CLEA)."

fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence B2b, field :94a::SAFE must not be present more than twice. When repeated, one and only one occurrence must be with format option L (:94L::SAFE)."
